definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to request/to require/requirement/to stake a claim/to ask/to demand/CL:點|点[dian3]
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of

sentences.english: Once more, Cinderella's fairy godmother reminded her to be home by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 仙女教母再一次提醒辛德瑞拉要在午夜前到家。

sentences.english: "More than any other subject, weight is delicate, " Maddison said.
sentences.chinese: “体重问题比其他问题都要微妙，”麦迪逊说。

sentences.english: Restaurant light box production must have characteristics, to attract customers.
sentences.chinese: 餐厅灯箱制作肯定要具有特色，要做到吸引顾客。

sentences.english: Restaurant light box production must have characteristics, to attract customers.
sentences.chinese: 餐厅灯箱制作肯定要具有特色，要做到吸引顾客。

sentences.english: All of them insisted on my staying with them a few days longer.
sentences.chinese: 他们所有的人都坚持要我再跟他们多呆几天时间。

sentences.english: In this way Pingya's room had been fumigated before he was moved in.
sentences.chinese: 所以平亚搬进他的新屋子之前，也得要用烟熏。

sentences.english: B:Here they are, will you weigh all our luggage together?
sentences.chinese: 这些都是，要不要把我的全部行李一起过磅？

sentences.english: In other words, be tactful, but don’t be afraid to give your honest opinion.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，要机智，但是别怕发表你真实的意见。

sentences.english: It's proving very difficult to peg him down to a definite date for completion.
sentences.chinese: 要规定他限期完成确是十分困难的。

sentences.english: Shepherd's purse green season, and grandmother would have to accompany her mother to pick the fields shepherd's purse.
sentences.chinese: 荠菜青青时节，外婆便要母亲陪着去田野里挑荠菜。

sentences.english: She may be not much, just want to let you stay with her.
sentences.chinese: 她也许要的不多，只是想让你陪陪她。

sentences.english: As the Speaker said, we've got more to do.
sentences.chinese: 正如佩洛西所说的，我们还有许多事情要做。

sentences.english: He was always excited by his life and busy with where it was going.
sentences.chinese: 他总是为他的生活而兴奋，忙着它要去的地方。

sentences.english: When a young man reached 18 or 20 years old, the capping ceremony would be held.
sentences.chinese: 一个年轻的男人十八岁或二十岁时，要举行冠礼。

sentences.english: Problems, if any, should be solved without delay.
In three more my sister would want to go.
sentences.chinese: 再过三年，妹妹也要上了。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
